#summary Source code repository access

= Repositories =

Since version 0.5 the [http://github.com/krasserm/grails-jaxrs grails-jaxrs sources] (including the full project history) are managed at [http://github.com/ GitHub]. Branches and tags up to version 0.4 are still available in the project's [http://code.google.com/p/grails-jaxrs/source/browse/ Subversion reprository].

=Command-line access=

To create a clone of the grails-jaxrs repository run

{{{
git clone git://github.com/krasserm/grails-jaxrs.git
}}}

from the command line. Developers with read/write access to the public repository should run

{{{
git@github.com:krasserm/grails-jaxrs.git
}}}
